item.title: By: Jes Borland

item.description: Dawei, I don't know - I haven't worked with SSRS in several years. Might be worth posting over on https://ask.sqlservercentral.com/?pageSize=15.
item.content:encoded: Dawei, I don’t know – I haven’t worked with SSRS in several years. Might be worth posting over on https://ask.sqlservercentral.com/?pageSize=15.

item.title: By: Dawei
item.dc:creator: Dawei
item.description:
Hi Jes, thanks for posting this.
Is this property works for ReportBuilder only? Looks like in the SSRS portal it doesn't work.
Thank you Dawei
item.content:encoded:
Hi Jes, thanks for posting this.

Is this property works for ReportBuilder only? Looks like in the SSRS portal it doesn’t work.

Thank you
Dawei
